message: Let's be fair and take the lion's share
I think a fair split is the best way to go. 50/50?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
I'm willing to be generous, but I need a bit more. How about 55/45?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Let's settle this. I'll take a slight edge, but this ensures we both benefit.
Getting closer to the deadline, let's split the difference again
Alice, we're running out of time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both don't leave empty-handed!
